description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 2 (most significant digit on left).
prog: (Python)from itertools import count.def a029471():...total = 0...power_of_two = 1...index_of_two = 0...length_of_string = 0....for n in count(1):......total += (n<<length_of_string)......if n==power_of_two:.........power_of_two*=2.........index_of_two += 1.......length_of_string += index_of_two.......if total % n == 0:.........yield n# _Christian Perfect_, Feb 07 2014
